results.title: Compelling images (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Advertising images have to be in sympathy with the brand they are selling otherwise the product may be rejected. This program shows how a new commercial was made to update the image of Levi jeans for the ‘80s.

results.title: Comparing two means
results.creator_credit: David Huntley, Stephen Braun, Chedd-Angier Productions, American Statistical Association and COMAP
results.brief_description:
Episode number 22 of Series “Against all odds: inside statistics”.
Teresa M. Amabile looks at how to analyse two-sample problems, using a t procedure, to calculate the confidence interval for the difference between two means and a significance test to see whether two populations have two different means. Examples used are a comparison of two job training schemes for welfare recipients, testing the properties of a new foam product against the former one, and the efficacy of coaching for aptitude tests.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Huntley, Stephen Braun, Chedd-Angier Productions, American Statistical Association and COMAP

Examples used are a comparison of two job training schemes for welfare recipients, testing the properties of a new foam product against the former one, and the efficacy of coaching for aptitude tests.

results.title: Como
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “National Trust”.
Looks at the National Trust property, Como, giving a description of the buildings and a brief history. Built prior to 1851, it was the home of the Armitage family until acquisition by the National Trust. Script by Glenn Berry.

results.title: Commutativity
results.brief_description: Uses animation, appropriate sound effects and narration to explain the principles of commutativity. Demonstrates that addition is commutative but subtraction is not. Stresses use of commutative property to make learning of addition facts easier.

results.title: Community under siege
results.creator_credit: Suzanne Davies, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In her role as a co-ordinator of the community centre, Suzanne Davies recounts the devastation that the Gippsland bushfires caused her community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
